analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/18/0x0e69a56bd2bb5a4a0cb44d3b96911f7cff01e29a.sol:
	Contract MaxRoyalCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/18/0x0e69a56bd2bb5a4a0cb44d3b96911f7cff01e29a.sol#216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
